metadata.title: CVE-2024-22915 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-use-after-free was found in SWFTools v0.9.2, in the functionswf_DeleteTag at rfxswf.c:1193. It allows an attacker to cause codeexecution.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
